metadata.name: Disable Powershell Command History
metadata.comment: Detects scripts or commands that disabled the Powershell command history by removing psreadline module

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-module')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('psreadline')))

output.summary: Detects scripts or commands that disabled the Powershell command history by removing psreadline module

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate script that disables the command history Reference: https://twitter.com/DissectMalware/status/1062879286749773824
